name: Block Motos | Top Dirt Bike Survival Racing Game for Free
name_original: Block Motos | Top Dirt Bike Survival Racing Game for Free
description:
You're the best motorcycle rider in New York. Nobody else but you can get away successfully after stealing the largest bank of the city.

In this survival race you have to prove your skills as a motorcycle racer and professional thief. The more you play the better you will ride your motorcycle! Be careful because other motorcycles and obstacles get in your way. This only makes the race more interesting! Can you dodge them all?

Choose your motorcycle and become the fastest dirtbike pilot of the pixel world! Feel the smell of burnt wheel in this frenetic race. Have fun exploring the streets of New York on your motorcycle while running away from the police!

Twitter: @LabCave
Facebook: www.facebook.com/LabCaveGames
